def extract_word(transformed_word):
    prefix = ''
    suffix = transformed_word[len(prefix):]
    original_word = suffix.split('-')[0]
    return original_word

def extract_word(transformed_word):
    prefix = 'drove'
    suffix = transformed_word[len(prefix):]
    original_word = suffix.split('-')[1]
    return original_word
